summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4172 for the improvement of the alley between Block 9, Assessor's Plat of University Heights Addition, and Block 1, Shelton's Addition, Block 1, Pettit's University Addition, between the alley between 12th Avenue Northeast and Brooklyn Avenue, from East 45th Street to East 47th Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 49782, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
